President John F. Kennedy jawbone steel manufacturers in the 1960s when he threatened to have the

to try to fight inflation in the 1970s. During the 2000 presidential campaign Republican

Sheriff had attempted to throttle the advertising of adult services on internet platforms by
threatening credit card companies that do business with them. Ruling against Dart and in favor of
